name: CATiledLayer
desc: A layer that provides a way to asynchronously provide tiles of the layer's content, potentially cached at multiple levels of detail.

items.name: class func fadeDuration() -> CFTimeInterval
items.desc: The time, in seconds, that newly added images take to "fade-in" to the rendered representation of the tiled layer.

items.name: var levelsOfDetail: Int
items.desc: The number of levels of detail maintained by this layer.

items.name: var levelsOfDetailBias: Int
items.desc: The number of magnified levels of detail for this layer.

items.name: var tileSize: CGSize
items.desc: The maximum size of each tile used to create the layer's content.
